title: Alpha.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
Bugs! The entire cave is filled with bugs
I knew they were down there but I never...
Fuck.
By the way you can escape out the right now
<<startQuest GameQuestObjects EscapeQuest>>

title: Alpha.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer alpha_default_silent>>
????
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer alpha_default_talking>>
You look new here
What's your name?
[[Emma|Alpha.Day1.Morning.Start.Yes]]
[[Not telling|Alpha.Day1.Morning.Start.No]]
[[...|Alpha.Day1.Morning.Start.Maybe]]

title: Alpha.Day2.Morning.Start
body:
I couldn't sleep well last night, these bunks are terrible
I guess they figure we won't live long enough, so why should they even get us good beds

title: Alpha.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
I made it through another day, ugh

So, personal question but, how'd you end up losing your freedom?
[[Family Farm|Alpha.Day2.Evening.Start.Yes]]
[[I don't want to say|Alpha.Day2.Evening.Start.No]]
[[Lie|Alpha.Day2.Evening.Start.Maybe]]

title: Alpha.Day3.Morning.Start
body:
I'm so cold, these tents don't keep any heat
We have a heater too, but they don't give us any wood for it, what's the point?

title: Alpha.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
I've survived three days in that cave
I was pretty resigned at this point but with you leading us I feel a bit better

title: Alpha.Day1.Morning.Start.No
body:
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer alpha_default_talking>>
Oh not telling huh? I get that.
[[Alpha.Day1.Morning.Start2]]

title: Alpha.Day1.Morning.Start.Yes
body:
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer alpha_default_talking>>
Emma's a good name, I don't think I met an Emma Before
[[Alpha.Day1.Morning.Start2]]

title: Alpha.Day1.Morning.Start.Maybe
body:
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer alpha_default_talking>>
Silent type huh? 
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer alpha_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
Nope
[[Alpha.Day1.Morning.Start2]]

title: Alpha.Day1.Morning.Start2
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer alpha_default_talking>>
People always told me "good luck", and I'd tell you the same, but. 
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer alpha_default_silent>>
Well luck just doesn't mean shit does it?

title: Alpha.Day2.Evening.Start.Yes
body:
"Our family farm's debt, we didn't make enough in last season's harvest to cover the interest"
Oh the intrest huh? Ain't that fucking terrible
You owe money, and they want to make a profit off that too
[[Alpha.Day2.Evening.Start2]]

title: Alpha.Day2.Evening.Start.No
body:
Oh, is it painful, huh? I understand
[[Alpha.Day2.Evening.Start2]]

title: Alpha.Day2.Evening.Start2
body:
Well me, I was walking on the wrong side of the street
Some cops were just rounding people up and they took me
Charged me with "evading peace officers" or something
I only was able to send a single letter out to my folks before they shipped me to the market
I still think about what I was doing that day, why the hell I decided to go for a walk at that particular time
Thats why I said I just stopped beliving it when people told me "Good Luck"
Like that's supposed to mean something
